body: Who cares if it's Stockholm Syndrome

Yep, Stockholm syndrome but the story didn't manage to cover how that happened. When she was sick, she was still hating on him, but it did a time skip and the girl suddenly became okay with it. Maybe because he took care of her while she was sick? His background story wasn't even really worth any sympathy but idk maybe it sounded differently to the hostage. In the end, she said that she will be waiting for him.
tf why did he do ? why did she do back ? and what ???
